title: Research Topic: Legal Resistance to Immigration Detention Expansion
summary: Based on the research priority 'Legal Resistance to Immigration Detention Expansion', this event represents a significant development in the area described as: Document the legal resistance efforts against immigration detention expansion, focusing on court cases, advocacy groups, and policy outcomes.... This event demonstrates the interconnected nature of global kleptocracy and corruption networks, involving multiple actors across jurisdictions and highlighting the need for coordinated international response.
